tool_description: Get information related to all type of books with their thumbnail
title: Bookify

api_list.name: getBooks
api_list.description: You can get all the books related to the query.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bookify.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bookify.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
